name: avant-vtt
description: A narrative RPG system for FoundryVTT

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:scss:dist && npm run build:ts && npm run build:packs && npm run build:assets && npm run ci:validate && npm run validate:partials && npm run validate:templates && npm run sounds:validate && npm run build:styleguide
scripts.build:scss:dist: mkdir -p dist/styles && sass styles/avant.scss dist/styles/avant.css --style=expanded --source-map && sass styles/avant.scss dist/styles/avant-sandbox.css --style=expanded --source-map
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:scss && npm run build:ts && npm run build:packs
scripts.compendium:pipeline: npm run compendium:check && npm run compendium:folders && npm run compendium:links && npm run compendium:roundtrip
scripts.guard:deprecated: npm run lint:deadcode && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const violations = []; const scanFiles = (dir) => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) return; fs.readdirSync(dir, { withFileTypes: true }).forEach(dirent => { if (dirent.isDirectory()) scanFiles(path.join(dir, dirent.name)); else if (dirent.name.match(/\.(js|ts)$/)) { const content = fs.readFileSync(path.join(dir, dirent.name), 'utf8'); if (content.includes('RemoteTraitService')) violations.push(path.join(dir, dirent.name) + ' (RemoteTraitService)'); if (content.match(/import.*accessibility|from.*accessibility/) && !path.includes('deprecated')) violations.push(path.join(dir, dirent.name) + ' (accessibility module)'); } }); }; scanFiles('scripts'); scanFiles('tests'); if (violations.length > 0) { console.error('❌ Found deprecated imports in:', violations.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ No deprecated imports found'); }"

author: Avant VTT Team
